about_the_game:
ABOUT THE CONTENTS

You can access the 'The Virtuous Housewife' story from 'Obedient Women'.

The Virtuous Housewife

HEROINE:
Sayako Kisaragi
A frustrated housewife who likes to get crazy whenever she masturbates with her horny vibrator.

SYNOPSIS (The Virtuous Housewife)


Sex is a body conversation between lovers...
A virtuous housewife named Sayako really believes that.
However, her body is frustrated because her husband is very busy and doesn't have sex with her these days.
She goes crazy when masturbating with her vibrator...even though she knows she's being bad.
Her whole world changes when a guy catches her in the act of going to town on herself...

content_descriptors.notes:
This game product contains sexual content and is intended for adults only.
It contains images and descriptions of adult nudity and sexual behavior.
The contents of this game are inappropriate for minors and perhaps not suitable for the workplace.
All characters involved in any sexual situations in this game are intended to be over 18 years of age.
Some non-consensual sexual activity is included.
This is a work of fiction.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 128MB, Resolution 720p
